content: Heard on ‘Car Talk’ on NPR this morning. Members of Congress should be forced to wear uniforms like ‘NASCAR’ Drivers. That way we can see who their corporate sponsors are!

content: quote: Originally posted by Another4Truth: Heard on ‘Car Talk’ on NPR this morning. Members of Congress should be forced to wear uniforms like ‘NASCAR’ Drivers. That way we can see who their corporate sponsors are! Classic!! Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin
